questions.question: Hayden Edwards, an empresario, declared independence from Mexico because......

choices.answer: the Mexican civilians were not nice to him
the mexican military tried to kill him
the government made him pay customs duties (taxes)

questions.question: After the Fredonian Revolt, the Mexican government didn't trust people of Texas. Why?

choices.answer: They thought the texans were going to kill them
They thought Texans wanted to be under Spanish rule
They thought the US was trying to take Texas</p>
They thought this revolt would lead to more revolts</p>

questions.question: Why did the Mier Y Teran Report scare the Mexican officials even more?

choices.answer: Because the US beat Mexico in futbol 5 to 1
Because the natives outnumbered mexicans 5 to 1

questions.question: What did the Mexian government do in response to the Mier Y Teran report?

choices.answer: They formed a huge military to attack Texas
The passed the Law of April 6th, 1830

questions.question: The Law of April 6th, 1830 did ALL of the following EXCEPT.....

choices.answer: Stopped ALL immigration from the US
Placed taxes on goods coming from the US
Established larger military force to enforce the law
gave ALL Texas citizens the freedom of speech

questions.question: A group from Anahuac tried to steal a cannon and get it past Mexican guards which leads to:
During the Conventions of 1832/1833, the Texans requested changes these changes to Mexican Law

choices.answer: Lift the ban on immigration from the US

questions.question: Who was chosen to deliver these requests to Santa Ana in Mexico City?
A land agent whose job it is to bring in new settlers to an area is called?
Stephen F. Austin's FIRST group of settlers to come to Texas were known as _____________
A person who controls an area through force and has absolute power is called a _______________
Why did SFA get charged with TREASON and end up getting thrown in prison in Mexico City?

choices.answer: He talked "bad" about the Mexican government in a letter
He shot a Mexican soldier on his way home
He stole food from Santa Anna's palace

questions.question: After being imprisoned, how did SFA NOW feel about the relationship between Texas & Mexico?

choices.answer: He still was on good terms with the Mexican government
He felt it was time for Texas to go to war with Mexico
He felt that the Mexican government was being fair with TX
He didn't like the government but wasn't ready to fight yet

questions.question: A tax being charged on good brought into a country is called a _______________
Where did a MAJORITY of Texas settlers come from?
Which future "hero" of the TX Revolution was arrested at BOTH Anahuac conflicts??
